Text:
Can anyone tell me if they can se this tupolev and the Posky when they search FS2004!

I cant and I don´t know why!
No, if you are searching "FS2004" you can't see them.
They publish today that it's absolutly ney release today. So you can get the latest here http://www.protu-154.com/files_e.html This is original website of this model.
jag har installerat den här men jag ser inte tupoleven i flight simulator kan jag göra något åt det?

That is because your looking in the wrong place.

The Tupolev is listed under "ANTK Tupolev" in the manufacturer list. 
And the Boeing is under "Project Opensky" in the manufacturer list:)
